description.displayText:
Carolyn managed my mother's care for more than 3 years, all the way to the end of her life. Carolyn was outstanding at her job and always put my mother's care first. 

Please also read my letter of reference for Her.
description.originalText:
Carolyn managed my mother's care for more than 3 years, all the way to the end of her life. Carolyn was outstanding at her job and always put my mother's care first. 

Please also read my letter of reference for Her.

description.displayText:
Carolyn worked for my family in several capacities in caring for both my grandmother and children (at different times). In both cases she was caring, responsible, kind, punctual, and became a part of our family. Additionally, she was consistent about reporting concerns of care to us immediately no matter how "small" they may have seemed; this was important to us as her care was vital to the well being of our family. 
In relationship to caring for my grandmother, she was responsible for daily care including feeding and cleaning, medications, outings including some doctors, interactions with physical health concerns, and spending time with her and making her comfortable. 
In relationship to caring for my children, she was responsible for daily care, feeding, love, interactive play, outings, being a part of our family, and being consistent in discipline.
